name: pnp-list-formatting-tic-tac-toe
title: Tic-tac-toe
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates a version of tic-tac-toe using list formatting. By using the setValue action, the underlying list items are updated and the format is redrawn.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates a version of tic-tac-toe using list formatting. By using the setValue action, the underlying list items are updated and the format is redrawn.

metadata.value: ms-bgColor-themePrimary, ms-bgColor-themeLight--hover, ms-bgColor-sharedRedOrange10, ms-bgColor-sharedYellow10, ms-fontColor-themePrimary, ms-fontColor-themeLight--hover, ms-fontColor-sharedRedOrange10, ms-fontColor-sharedYellow10, ms-fontWeight-semibold, ms-fontSize-16

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
